LocaleLayout.title: Side Nav Bar
LocaleLayout.description: A side menu that is compatible with different page sizes and turns into a drop-down menu on mobile pages.

AboutPage.About_me:
As a front-end web developer, my primary responsibility is to create and implement the user interface of websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
I'm a back-end developer who works on server-side logic and database interactions. I use Express.js to build web applications and APIs and work with SQL and NoSQL databases to store and retrieve data.
So, I can say about myself that I am a full-stack developer
